body:
The current standard for admin panel authentication is LDAP. `auth0` is being prototyped by infosec but we're not yet ready to integrate it on our admin panels. I'm staying on top of it, I'll let you know when it's good to go.

And, indeed, you should store passwords. Use LDAP ;)
